  • Field Details

    • initialState

      protected State initialState
      Initial state. The user can only load a map xml file.

    • loadedMapState

      protected State loadedMapState
      State when the map is loaded. User can load another map, or load a request xml file.

    • loadedRequestsState

      protected State loadedRequestsState
      State when the map and a list of requests are loaded. User can load another map, load another list of requests or ask the app to compute the tour.

    • computingTourState

      protected State computingTourState
      State when the map and a list of requests are loaded, and the tour is computing. User can either wait or stop the tour computation.

    • computedTourState

      protected State computedTourState
      State when the map and a list of requests are loaded, and the corresponding tour is computed. User can load another map, load another list of requests, or modify the tour.

    • addingRequestState1

      protected State addingRequestState1
      State when the map and a list of requests are loaded, the corresponding tour is computed, and the user has asked to add another request. User can only click on the graphical view (to add a pickup stop).

    • addingRequestState2

      protected State addingRequestState2
      State when the map and a list of requests are loaded, the corresponding tour is computed, and the user has already started to add a new request. (ie a pickup has been placed). User can only click on the graphical view (to add a delivery stop).

    • movingStopState

      protected State movingStopState
      State when the map and a list of requests are loaded, the corresponding tour is computed, and the user has dragged on a stop to move it. User can only release the mouse to place the stop at its new location.
